name: skincarerecommendationsystem
description: Full-stack Skin Care Recommendation System with React, Node.js, and Flask ML model.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n MODEL,SERVER,CLIENT -c yellow,green,cyan "npm run model" "npm run server" "npm run client"
